org.opendaylight.controller.sample.l2switch.md.topology

Interface NetworkGraphService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NetworkGraphDijkstra

    public interface NetworkGraphService
    Service that allows to build a network graph using Topology links Link and exposes operation that can be performed on such graph.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLinks(java.util.List<org.opendaylight.yang.gen.v1.urn.tbd.params.xml.ns.yang.network.topology.rev131021.network.topology.topology.Link> links)
      Adds links to existing graph or creates new graph with given links if graph was not initialized.
      void clear()
      Clears the prebuilt graph, in case same service instance is required to process a new graph.
